com.altran.general.emf.ecoredoc.maven

Class EcoredocMavenPlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • com.altran.general.emf.ecoredoc.maven.EcoredocMavenPlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo

    @Mojo(name="ecoredoc",
      defaultPhase=PROCESS_SOURCES)
public class EcoredocMavenPlugin
extends org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
    Creates JavaDoc-like documents for Ecore metamodels in AsciiDoctor format.
    See Also:
    JavaDoc Homepage, Ecore Wiki entry, AsciiDoctor Homepage

    • Field Detail

      • inputFiles

        @Parameter(property="inputFiles",
           required=true)
private java.util.Set<java.io.File> inputFiles
        All ecore metamodel files we want to generate documentation for.

      • outputFile

        @Parameter(property="outputFile",
           required=true)
private java.io.File outputFile
        The output file to write the documentation to.

        By convention, the file extension is .adoc.

        Caution: If the file exists, it will be overwritten and a warning is emitted.

      • resolve

        @Parameter
private boolean resolve
        Whether we should explicitly resolve all EMF proxies.

      • config

        @Parameter(property="config")
private com.altran.general.emf.ecoredoc.generator.config.EcoreDocGeneratorConfig config
        Detailed configuration of the generated documentation.
